metadata.name: Meta-morphic: Seven Treasures
metadata.description: 2,197 Seven Treasure NFTs (Gemstones & Minerals) is based on the Seven Treasures â€“ coral, seashell, gold, silver, agate, turquoise, and pearl. Each revealed treasure is based on never before seen work by Huang Yuxing. Each treasure is visually unique and carries specific rarity traits.
